name: Hilag Lance
loreDescription: As she lifted her lance, a cry burst out from behind her. She believed she would soon be able to overthrow the Archdemon. "If I cannot do it, Goddess, give me the power to fight on forever."

skillDescription.base: Increases Combat Readiness by 5.0% when an ally is attacked by a Single Attack.
skillDescription.max: Increases Combat Readiness by 10.0% when an ally is attacked by a Single Attack.
